1.0.name: wordpress/playerzbr
1.0.description:
US - English

PlayerZBR The Plugin allows the user to add a player in HTML 5, using your url of your streaming, online radio stations and depart ideal site for musicians. Made with HTML 5 aims to better performance for your users!

Thanks For Use and Evaluate!

PT-BR - Portugues do Brasil

O Plugin PlayerZBR permite o usuario a adicionar um player em HTML 5, usando a sua url de seu streaming, ideal parta radios online e site de musicos. Feito com HTML 5 visa a melhor performance para seus usuarios!

Obrigado Por Usar e Avaliem!

OBS - O Browser Mozilla Firefox nao suporta Audio em HTML 5
